definition[0]: involving computers and computer programs that use a mixture of sound, pictures, video, and writing to give information
definition[1]: using several different methods of giving information, for example using television, newspapers, books, and computers
example[2]: a multimedia exhibition on nuclear power
definition[2]: using a mixture of sound, pictures, film, and writing to communicate, educate, or entertain
example[3]: Multimedia computers have attracted a new group of buyers.
example[4]: This laptop can run multimedia games programs.
definition[3]: using several different methods of presenting information or advertising, for example television, newspapers, books, and computers
